data.title: Prohibitions, Restrictions and Notices
data.meta_description: This information may apply to U.S. or foreign-registered aircraft. Our office provides the information on this site as a public service. You may contact 9-AFS-200Correspondence@faa.gov regarding FAA Special Federal Aviation Regulations (SFARs), particularly regarding SFAR exemptions, applicable to any countries listed below or for updates as specified in OpSpec B450.
data.text:
This information may apply to U.S. or foreign-registered aircraft. Our office provides the information on this site as a public service. You may contact 9-AFS-200Correspondence@faa.gov regarding FAA Special Federal Aviation Regulations (SFARs), particularly regarding SFAR exemptions, applicable to any countries listed below or for updates as specified in OpSpec B450.

You may contact the PRN POC at 9-ator-hq-ifos@faa.gov with any other comments, questions, or content recommendations. To stay updated, subscribe to GovDelivery updates regarding this webpage.

Domestic Security NOTAMs (KFDC) and FAA Routing Requirements

United States

Cuba

Russian Federation

International Security NOTAMs (KICZ)

Alphabetical List by Country

The following acronyms are used to identify sources of information:

United States

KFDC NOTAM 4/1786 - Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) Flight Routing Authorization Requirements in United States Territorial Airspace

Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) Flight Routing Authorization Requirements for China in United States Territorial Airspace

Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) Flight Routing Authorization Requirements for Cuba in United States Territorial Airspace

Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) Flight Routing Authorization Requirements for Iran in United States Territorial Airspace

Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) Flight Routing Authorization Requirements for North Korea in United States Territorial Airspace

Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) Flight Routing Authorization Requirements for Sudan in United States Territorial Airspace (PDF)

Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) Flight Routing Authorization Requirements for Syria in United States Territorial Airspace (PDF)

Other Security Related Flight Information and Procedures
